text: Fear Is the Key is a 1972 British action thriller movie directed by Michael Tuchner and was based on the 1961 novel of the same name by Alastair MacLean. It stars Barry Newman, Suzy Kendall, Dolph Sweet, John Vernon, Ben Kingsley, Ray McAnally, Tony Anholt, Peter Ellis, Elliott Sullivan and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 action movies Category:1972 thriller movies Category:British action thriller movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Louisiana Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about murder Category:Movies directed by Michael Tuchner
title: Fear Is the Key (movie)
